responseText: Can you even imagine? When I began this project I had no idea. I thought we would be unearthing battlefields, or perhaps the foundations of fortified keeps. I did not expect the disarray, the terror that these poor people must have suffered! I shudder to imagine the last days that those refugees spent in this place - not a glorious garrison of war, but a squalorous redoubt of the desperate!
name: SQ_NOC_RVR_Samias_Miraleth_MartinSwift_3_Response
